title: Rejected by people, Congress sows seeds of divide, is leader of tukde tukde gang: PM Modi - The Indian Express
content:
1. Rejected by people, Congress sows seeds of divide, is leader of tukde tukde gang: PM Modi  The Indian Express
  2. "Congress Leader Of 'Tukde-Tukde' Gang": PM's All-Out Attack In Parliament  NDTV
  3. Parliament budget session 2022 live updates: PM Modi replies to Motion of Thanks to President's address in Lok Sabha  Times of India
  4. Highlights: Cong policy 'divide and rule', leader of 'Tukde Tukde', says PM  Hindustan Times
  5. Our focus is to strengthen small farmers, rural economy: PM Modi  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: PM Modi, who singled out the Congress party for criticism in his 100-minute-long speech while replying to the debate on Motion of Thanks to the President’s address, accused the party of “instigating” migrants to breach lockdown during the Covid pandemic and “hating the small farmers”.
